summary: Rebrand/update the app into a "Prize Portal" experience (previously TikTok-style).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Prize Portal logo mark, clean vector-like style on transparent background (logo-prize-portal.dim_512x512.png)
- Trophy icon, premium/gold style on transparent background (trophy-icon-prize.dim_200x200.png)
- Hero cover image, prize portal themed abstract/premium background (hero-cover-prize-portal.dim_1600x600.png)
- Verification badge icon, premium style on transparent background (verification-badge-prize.dim_100x100.png)
- Face/ID verification icon, premium style on transparent background (face-verify-icon-prize.dim_150x150.png)
- Celebration background, premium confetti/spotlight style (celebration-bg-prize.dim_1200x800.png)

## Edit Images
- Update to Prize Portal logo styling (logo-tiktok.dim_512x512.png > logo-prize-portal.dim_512x512.png)
- Update to Prize Portal hero cover styling (hero-cover-tiktok.dim_1600x600.png > hero-cover-prize-portal.dim_1600x600.png)
- Update to premium Prize Portal trophy icon styling (trophy-icon-neon.dim_200x200.png > trophy-icon-prize.dim_200x200.png)
- Update to premium Prize Portal face verification icon styling (face-verify-icon-neon.dim_150x150.png > face-verify-icon-prize.dim_150x150.png)
- Update to premium Prize Portal verification badge styling (verification-badge-neon.dim_100x100.png > verification-badge-prize.dim_100x100.png)
- Update to Prize Portal celebration background styling (celebration-bg-tiktok.dim_1200x800.png > celebration-bg-prize.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Rebrand the UI from the current TikTok/neon styling to a cohesive “Prize Portal” brand across all screens while keeping the existing flow unchanged (lookup → activation → eligibility → identity upload → receipt → completion).
Update user-facing text to use “Prize Portal” branding (e.g., header title, footer copyright line, hero/alt text, button/step labels where appropriate) and ensure all user-facing text is in English.
Replace TikTok-themed generated image references in the UI with Prize Portal-branded generated assets, and ensure the app loads the new assets from frontend/public/assets/generated.

Define and apply a distinct visual theme for Prize Portal (colors, typography, surfaces, and component styling) that is consistent across the app and is not TikTok-like/neon. Avoid a blue/purple primary palette.
Remove/replace promotion-specific eligibility copy that references TikTok so the eligibility checklist is generic to a Prize Portal (without changing the checklist interaction behavior).

new_feature_requests.summary: Rebrand/convert the current app into "Prize Portal" (rename and update overall experience accordingly).
